name: Curious Chimps
description:
A game inspired by Gorilla Tag.

Return to chimp.

Explore the multiple environments your home has to offer. Run, jump and climb using only your arms. Stack on top of each other to reach new heights. Climb trees and swing around the forest. Climb walls, Run on the ground, jump from branch to branch around different trees. Why not a little adventure to satisfy that chimp curiosity?

No more hooman.
